achievements.title: Wild Hacks MLH Hackathon Winner (1st Place)
achievements.description: Won 1st place in Wild Hacks MLH 2025. Built an edge device for long-distance forest fire detection, using a fine-tuned GenAI model deployed on Raspberry Pi.

achievements.title: OraHacks Hackathon Winner (1st Place)
achievements.description: Won 1st place in Chicago OraHacks 2024. Constructed a multimodal AI video generation system integrating news scraping and rapid video production, finishing in 48 hours.

achievements.title: TikTok TechJam Hackathon Finalist (Top 10)
achievements.description: Reached Top 10 in TikTok TechJam 2024 (USA section). Secured position for Gen AI project, ranking among the top 0.3% of global participants.

achievements.title: Google AI Hackathon Finalist (Top 25)
achievements.description: Reached top 25 in Google AI hackathon 2024.

achievements.title: KSIT State Hackathon Runner-up (2nd Place)
achievements.description: Won 2nd place in Ksit State India Hackathon 2022.

achievements.title: Global Academy State Hackathon (3rd Place)
achievements.description: Won 3rd place in Global Academy State India Hackathon 2022.
